name: REAL WORLD - Hannah Macklin & The Maxwells
description:
DEBUT ALBUM
Release date: May 13, 2011

REAL WORLD is the debut release from soul-pop seductress Hannah Macklin and her band of charmers, The Maxwells. In this thirteen-track-treat, sunny soul meets dashes of rock ‘n’ roll, funk and r&b, all laden with alternative pop hooks and sparkling production. Larger-than-life metaphors are used to describe elements of Hannah’s real world; lyrically, the album is a sojourn through imperfect love, imaginary lust, life lessons learned through the eyes of earthworms and tales of overseas tapestries. Old-school nostalgia and new-school curiousity are equal forces in Hannah’s Real World – of which she would very much like you to be a part.

name: Pin-up boy Maxwell badge
description: Inspired by the 1950s pin-ups and slick hair is pin-up boy Maxwell, the official mascot of Hannah Macklin & The Maxwells. Here he is in badge form, to be pinned up on your shirt, cardigan, vest or bag to be displayed in all his suave, sassy glory.
